DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetics omega-3 rosuvastatin omega-3 coadministration HCP1007 healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetics Omega-3 Between Rosuvastatin Omega-3 Coadministration HCP1007
DOC.criteria: Adult male age 20 55 year A body mass index 19 27 kg/m2 History hepatobiliary , renal , gastrointestinal , respiratory , musculoskeletal , endocrinal , hematooncologic cardiovascular disease SBP < 90 ≥ 150 mmHg , DBP < 60 ≥90 mmHg Use herbal medicine within 30 day , prescriptive medicine within 14 day , overthecounter drug within 7 day Heavy alcohol consumption ( 140 g/day )
